Trade/Device Name(s): Cepheid Xpert® GBS LB Control Panel
Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert GBS LB Control Panel as external assayed quality control for nucleic acid detection of Group B Streptococcus on GeneXpert system
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use as external assayed positive and negative quality control materials to monitor in vitro nucleic acid testing for qualitative detection of Group B Streptococcus using Cepheid Xpert GBS LB Assay on GeneXpert Instrument System
